Kidney donor mentoring; donor activist and advocate

On May 1st, I will be leaving Phoenix to drive cross-country for a month, interviewing & filming 13 other kidney donors to raise awareness for live organ donation.

recommendations: Michael Lake
Advertising / Design / Marketing Strategist / Crafting the voice of media trading @ Evergreen-Partners
March 10, 2015, Michael was a client of Amy’s

I recently attended a live seminar by Amy on Twitter and quickly realized that she was someone I needed to learn social media from. After spending some quality consulting time with Amy, I have reacquainted myself with Twitter and feel well on my way to better engaging with it for fun and profit.Amy might not agree, but I view her as the soul of Twitter. It's not just her knowledge of the mechanics of hashtags, retweet variations or the finer points of search. Anyone can teach that. Instead, Amy has a great feel for the right tone of a Twitter conversation and an immediate grasp of a Twitter user's skill or intent - and how best to respond to that. Her keen understanding of the platform provided me with a much better understanding of Twitter engagement, for relationship building and how best to find the people important to me.I recommend Amy for anyone looking to take their enjoyment and skill with Twitter to a much higher level.

C.E.O. at Snap To It, Inc. and COZA International
March 28, 2012, Kate was a client of Amy’s

I hired Amy to set up the Facebook page for my business in November 2011.  I knew I had to engage in social media but did not have the time to do it.  Because Amy is very experienced and knowledgable in the social media/marketing field, my business page was set up correctly and the results were astounding.  Gradual at first, the "background work" of engaging with other companies to get the brand awareness out there began to pay off by month 4.  The number of likes rocketed weekly, and her creativity in engaging with my customers attracted enormous interest.  She also has the ability to explain the operation of social media in an easy to understand manner, making the whole process simple and a lot of fun.  I am extremely happy with the service Amy provides and would highly recommend her for social media.  She is great to work with!

summary: I've always been the social butterfly, even back in elementary school. It's exactly why I got into doing Social Media. It started when I joined Myspace as a comedian and radio DJ, and helped a small business with their profile there. That was in 2005, and I have been helping others on Social Media ever since.I started my own company, The Fab Social, in 2012. I spend a lot of time reading up on the latest trends in Social Media and attending workshops and conferences to keep learning.As a Social Media Consultant, helping small businesses is the greatest reward. They don't understand Social Media. As a former high school teacher, I've got the patience and creativity to teach Social Media to anyone. In the cannabis industry, I teach compliant social media, so brands don't lose their accounts on social networks for not following the rules.Six years ago, I donated my kidney after seeing a tweet. In May 2013, I embarked on a cross-country trip to interview and film other kidney donors, for the documentary "Social Media Stole My Kidney."​ It was funded largely through Indiegogo, by my social media following.I also have a sister who found me on Facebook. I hadn't seen her in over 20 years! So, when people say Social Media is stupid, I have evidence otherwise.One of my favorite things to do is lead workshops to show business owners the correct ways to build their followers and fanbases and how to engage with their audiences.Social media is probably the best tool out there for someone with my experience using it. I've met the coolest & smartest people in my life through social media!  It's also how my friend found someone to donate their kidney to her mom - me!  When people use the phrase "think outside the box,"​ they're pretty much talking about me.Specialties: I'm fearless, so I'm always willing to try & learn new things.  I'm great at earning confidence from my clients, because I never speak TO them, I speak WITH them. Email me amy@gethybridsocial.com
name: Amy Donohue
